ygData.subject: Re: Paw of Opalla and Desperate request for aid.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Try South Karanas In South Karanas, you can hunt elephants, bull elephants, centaur foals and shelties, aviak darters and egrets......as you level you can
ygData.messageBody:
> Where can a 21st level Cleric(human) possibly go to get some XP... I'm
> sooo tired of pull and kill in Permafrost and Unrest... with the all the

Try South Karanas

In South Karanas, you can hunt elephants, bull elephants, centaur foals and
shelties, aviak darters and egrets......as you level you can hunt in the
same zone aviak rooks and harriers, and centaur archers and coursers...there
is stuff there you can hunt until level 30 or so..............the neat thing
is there is no faction hit for killing either aviaks or centaurs.......hope
this helps........stick to the northern half of the zone for elephants and
centaurs, lower half of the zone for aviaks.........

Or if you are soloing try scythe beetles and borer beetles in North
Karanas...............

Dweezeman Dourbough, Level 30 cleric on E'Ci, portrayed in real life by:

Clay Armstrong
Vice President Software Development
Travel Technologies Group
claya@...
(214) 346-4684

> ok, new topic....
>

> sooo tired of pull and kill in Permafrost and Unrest... with the all the
> deaths I'm barely gaining XP.... I lose like 3/4 to a full bub of XP

RIGHT

scarecrows
> to make up for the XP I lost in Perma... but now I get jack from em...
>

holy

>
